name: Mimic (itch) (AndrewLGN)
description:
Mimic is a first person controlled game where you're trying to find a hiding mimic, which can pretend to be any object, and teleport when not being looked directly at. I made Mimic for Weekly Game Jam 123, https://itch.io/jam/weekly-game-jam-123, with the theme of Same But Different, and I think mimics fall into that theme very well.

While I am happy with this game, I do wish I was able to get more finished, I wanted multiple levels and a proper tutorial, however I started late and with it being a full 3d game I was not able to get it done and instead focused on trying to get the single level to a more polished state.

I'm going to keep developing this game until it at least reaches what I envisioned for it, with multiple levels and additional gear to choose from to help you. Expect updates here!

Thanks for playing!

If you're interested in following other projects I develop then follow me on Twitter.

https://twitter.com/Andrew_LGN
